parameters.first-value:
clamp((ClickablePanel.Y + ClickablePanel.Height - ClickablePanel.padding) - Panel.Y, 0, 1) + 
clamp((Panel.Y + Panel.Height) - (ClickablePanel.Y + ClickablePanel.padding), 0, 1) +
clamp((ClickablePanel.X + ClickablePanel.Width  - ClickablePanel.padding) - Panel.X, 0, 1) + 
clamp((Panel.X + Panel.Width) - (ClickablePanel.X + ClickablePanel.padding), 0, 1)

clamp((ClickablePanel.Y + ClickablePanel.Height) - Panel.Y, 0, 1) + 
clamp((Panel.Y + Panel.Height) - ClickablePanel.Y, 0, 1) +
clamp((ClickablePanel.X + ClickablePanel.Width) - Panel.X, 0, 1) + 
clamp((Panel.X + Panel.Width) - ClickablePanel.X, 0, 1)

clamp((ClickablePanel.Y + ClickablePanel.Height - ClickablePanel.padding) - Panel.Y, 0, 1) + 
clamp((Panel.Y + Panel.Height) - (ClickablePanel.Y + ClickablePanel.padding), 0, 1) +
clamp((ClickablePanel.X + ClickablePanel.Width  - ClickablePanel.padding) - Panel.X, 0, 1) + 
clamp((Panel.X + Panel.Width) - (ClickablePanel.X + ClickablePanel.padding), 0, 1)
